summary: not to be a demon phannie but phil’s making a qna and, like last time, i found myself wondering if he answers the age old...
body:
not to be a demon phannie but

phil’s making a qna and, like last time, i found myself wondering if he answers the age old question “are you dating dan?”

what if he said yes? just think about that for a second. 

okay that has been my contribution to the phandom today now go, go and phangirl/boy/other

blog.name: phanfictioncatalogue
blog.title: phanfiction catalogue
blog.description:
mobile users, click here!

please refer to our FAQ first.

Our goal is to create an alphabetized library of every phanfiction in the phandom. Besides that, we compile masterlists of different genres that are scheduled for posting every few days, and help find fics that have been mislocated.

title: University (Non AU) Masterlist
body:
And (ao3) - iihappydaysii

Summary: Phil’s missing Dan while he’s at uni, and he’s very happy for some unexpected time together.

Crawling back to you - definitelythor

Summary: Dan and Phil started having phone sex while Dan was at uni. Now they’re both coming to the realisation they want more, but they can still only tell each other over the phone.

Cross Your Fingers, Here We Go (ao3) - goldfishsunglasses

Summary: Dan can’t sleep, so he convinces Phil to come see him in the middle of the night, but Phil refuses to spend the night in his much too small uni room. Once they’re back at Phil’s, the late hour causes him to voice some feelings of doubt about their future, but Dan assures him those are silly, and that what they have is strong enough to last.

Dirty Socks (ao3) - watergator

Summary: based off of Dan’s ‘what not to do at university’ video

Dan finds himself outside, alone, in the freezing cold at two in the morning with a suitcase full of dirty laundry, and even though uni is eating him alive, there’s only really one person he wants to be with.

Dropout - ficster28

Summary: Based on Dan’s video ‘College Dropout).

Fool (ao3) - your_starless_eyes

Summary: Dan calls Phil while at university.

If You Must Wait (Wait For Them Here In My Arms) (ao3) - commonemergency

Summary:  “Protect me then.” Dan whispers, and Phil can tell that he’s drifting with the way that he loosens his grip. 

Or sometimes being an adult is hard but Dan has a Phil to give him cuddles so it’s okay.

I Love You, Really, Too - whiskersandquiff

Summary: Dan’s having a rough time getting used to university, so Phil comforts him.

Lights - phanfics-anonymous

Summary: Dan’s crying over his existential crisis about uni and Phil is there and he comforts Dan and is just really sweet.

Manchester University Surgery - amazingdanielhowell

Summary: Dan is getting surgery and gets scared, and he doesn’t want Phil to leave the room.

run from the lights, run from the night. (ao3) - commonemergency

Summary: “This isn’t his first hangover but it always feels like the first time whenever he drinks too much,” or Dan is hungover and insecure and Phil still loves him anyway.

The Laundry Fic - elliesfics

Summary: So we all know from Dan’s latest video that he spent his early years of Uni travelling down to Phil’s flat to do ‘laundry’. Here’s that fic. (Despite the title, I promise it’s not one of those fics).

The Rest Can Wait (ao3) - waveydnp

Summary: Dan’s year at Manchester university.

You’ll Be Okay - cocktailaunt

Summary: 2009!Phan: Dan’s scared about going to university.

You’re always there to catch me - danhowellsfringe

Summary: Phil always helps Dan with everything from live decisions to every day tasks and Dan tries to repay him somehow.

reblog.comment:

summary:
question: "why did you send that tweet fucking 3 times??"
answer: "dan was my kitten that day and walked over the keyboard. bad...
body:
question: “why did you send that tweet fucking 3 times??”

answer: “dan was my kitten that day and walked over the keyboard. bad kitten. No worries though: he got punished adequately. *chuckles* he wasn’t able to sit for 2 whole days”

reblog.comment:

summary: bbcstudiostalentworks: The class of 19. Slightly delayed post but this time last week there were lots of happy faces after a...
body: bbcstudiostalentworks: The class of 19. Slightly delayed post but this time last week there were lots of happy faces after a brilliant week at Bore Place. TalentWorks partnered with the BBC Writers Room to take eight bright stars in the digital talent space away on a scripted comedy writing retreat, learning everything from how to form a sitcom character, crafting a topical joke to just finding out the funny within you. We were totally blown away by the talent and can’t wait to see the ideas that flourish from the project. Thanks so much to everyone involved. #talentworks

reblog.comment: bbcstudiostalentworks: The class of 19. Slightly delayed post but this time last week there were lots of happy faces after a brilliant week at Bore Place. TalentWorks partnered with the BBC Writers Room to take eight bright stars in the digital talent space away on a scripted comedy writing retreat, learning everything from how to form a sitcom character, crafting a topical joke to just finding out the funny within you. We were totally blown away by the talent and can’t wait to see the ideas that flourish from the project. Thanks so much to everyone involved. #talentworks

TalentWorks partnered with the BBC Writers Room to take eight bright stars in the digital talent space away on a scripted comedy writing retreat, learning everything from how to form a sitcom character, crafting a topical joke to just finding out the funny within you. We were totally blown away by the talent and can’t wait to see the ideas that flourish from the project. Thanks so much to everyone involved. #talentworks

TalentWorks partnered with the BBC Writers Room to take eight bright stars in the digital talent space away on a scripted comedy writing retreat, learning everything from how to form a sitcom character, crafting a topical joke to just finding out the funny within you. We were totally blown away by the talent and can’t wait to see the ideas that flourish from the project. Thanks so much to everyone involved. #talentworks
